intro:
The most exciting puzzle & stealth action game is here for you!
Control Ninja and assassinate all the white enemies.
description:
The most exciting puzzle & stealth action game that presented by『Q』series staff is coming to Nintendo Switch™! 

Here are some tips to enjoy this game.

- Ninja always bounces once.
- Don't say that the ninja and the floor are hard to see.
　Darkness is your ally.
- Just move from dark to dark.
- Red objects are dangerous. Both for the enemy and for you.
- Some light sources can be destroyed.
- In some cases, cutting the rope can open the path.
- Watch out for places without walls or floors.
